Literature.Title: Bacterial Lipodepsipeptides and Some of Their Derivatives and Cyclic Dipeptides as Potential Agents for Biocontrol of Pathogenic Bacteria and Fungi of Agrarian Plants
Literature.Author: Castaldi S, Cimmino A, Masi M, Evidente A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas caryophylli NCPPB 349(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. panici ICMP 3955(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci ICMP 2706(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae B475(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. japonica ICMP 6305(MIC=0.1µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis PY79(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Bacillus megaterium QMB(MIC=0.2µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(no activity data),Colletotrichum truncatum 17-5-5(MIC=0.2µg/ml)
